Articles.Content:
New updates have been released for JoolPlus, SarnusPlus and UrlumPlus fixing several issues. and adding a number of compatibility things.

OPX-JoolPlus v0.4.2:

  • new settings option to retain the stock masses and radii for Laythe, Vall, Tylo, and Bop (requested by @Ultimate Steve)
  • fix to the BopTrojan=False setting ensuring it orbits in the correct position and not on top of Tylo
  • compatibility patch for Kcalbeloh, ensuring the wormhole doesn't nullref and break the game
  • compatibility with KopEx Footprints, DMagic Orbital Science, and TarsierSpaceTech

OPX-SarnusPlus v0.2.1:

  • compatibility with KopEx Footprints, DMagic Orbital Science, and TarsierSpaceTech
  • fixes for Vizak, Ryla, and Phabus' PQSSpace appearance

OPX-UrlumPlus v0.2.1:

  • compatibility with KopEx Footprints, DMagic Orbital Science, and TarsierSpaceTech
  • fixes for Dathil, Lyxis, and Pymm's PQSSpace appearance

 

Edited 6 hours ago by The Minmus Derp
researchbodies compatibility doesn't actually work bruh

i found a problem with sarnusplus. the issue is researchbodies. it just does not hide the objects

Edited 11 hours ago by theogameren

4 hours ago, theogameren said:

i found a problem with sarnusplus. the issue is researchbodies. it just does not hide the objects

I have no clue what could be wrong. I do all the things every other research bodies compatibility config does in exactly the same way. Do you have a log?

bruh i uninstalled it and i looked in the cfg and found this

Spoiler

RESEARCHBODIES:NEEDS[ResearchBodies]
{
    loadAs = mod
    name = OPX-SarusPlus
    ONDISCOVERY
    {
        Vizak = ITS A UFO! WE'RE UNDER ATTACK! What's that? Moon? Sarnus is right there? Oh. Uhhh. I'll call it... Vizak. Yes. Definitely not a keysmash.
    Ryla = Stop putting lentils in front of my telescope.
    Masmar = This little guy whizzing around beyond Sarnus' rings must have suffered a beating in its youth, with that giant crater.
    Encethys = This thing is way too bright. Our telescopes are failing to pick out any detail on its surface. Definitely made of ice, though.
    Hypo = Who put this pumice stone in space? I don't think that's where it goes. 
    Phabus = Wow, I'm lucky I found this thing! It really is way out there from the rest of the moon system, I sure hope there isn't anything related to an alien molecule. 
  }
     IGNORELEVELS
  {
       Vizak = true true true true
    Ryla = true true true true
    Masmar = true true true true
    Encethys = true true true true
    Hypo = true true true true
    Phabus = true true true true
    }
}

bro u did a typo in the name thingy

Oh.

Try adding the "n" and see if that fixes it. I'll change that for the next update alongside an ACTUAL fix for Vizak, Ryla and Phabus since the previous fix made it worse.
I think ResearchBodies only works with new bodies if you make a new save, in any case. Try that
